name: Alpine Pro Backpack
description: 60L technical mountaineering backpack with adjustable suspension system, reinforced climbing gear loops, and waterproof compartments. Built for multi-day expeditions in extreme conditions.

name: Summit Trekking Boots
description: Waterproof leather hiking boots with Vibram soles and ankle support. Perfect for technical approaches and long-distance trails in variable terrain.

name: Three seasons Hiking Tent
description: Lightweight 3-season tent with durable ripstop nylon fabric and aluminum poles. Color blue. Easy setup with color-coded clips and stakes, ideal for backpacking and camping trips.

name: Vertical Edge Climbing Harness
description: Lightweight sport climbing harness with ergonomic design and four gear loops. Certified for indoor and outdoor climbing up to 5.14 difficulty.

name: Grip Master Chalk Bag
description: Durable chalk bag with fleece lining and secure drawstring closure. Features belt loop and reinforced base for long-lasting performance on the wall.

name: Dynamic 70m Climbing Rope
description: UIAA certified 9.8mm dynamic rope rated for 300+ falls. Excellent handling characteristics with dry treatment for all-weather climbing.

name: Rock Grip Pro Climbing Shoes
description: High-performance climbing shoes with sticky rubber and asymmetric design. Ideal for steep sport routes and bouldering projects.

name: Storm Shield Mountaineering Jacket
description: 3-layer Gore-Tex pro shell jacket with pit zips and adjustable hood. Designed for alpine climbing and extreme weather protection.

name: Trail Blaze Softshell Jacket
description: Breathable softshell jacket with water-resistant coating and stretch panels. Perfect for active mountain pursuits and changing conditions.

name: Expedition Camp Stove
description: Compact multi-fuel camping stove with windscreen and piezo ignition. Boils water in under 3 minutes, ideal for high-altitude cooking.

name: Alpine Expedition 4-Season Tent
description: Robust 4-season mountaineering tent designed for harsh conditions. Features geodesic dome structure, reinforced poles, and exceptional snow load capacity.
